column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Very decent ramen in a lovely warehouse hip space.  The octopus balls appetizer is excellent
column2: check out the picture!  So the ramen is above average
column3: the broth is rich and full bodied
column5: they do charge extra for additional ingredients
column6: like an egg.  But their prices are on par with other places.  If you like ramen
column7: try it and then compare it with the Tonkatsu ramen at Kata.
